AIR
EXPRESS
Here's how
you can use
AIR EXPRESS
for
MORE BUSINESS
BIGGER PROFITS...

AIR EXPRESS
" Speed
SHORT-CUTS TIME...BUILDS UP SALES...
Super Swift AIR ExPrEss-
-2500 miles over-
night — makes the whole continent a
"close-up" — saves hours and days on de-
liveries — puts nation-wide markets at your
shipping room door. Its prompt, quick ser-
vice pays big dividends in added product
prestige and customer good-will. AIR Ex-
PRESS is the fastest, most useful shipping
service in the world and to modern business
the most economical, too. Day and night
thousands of smart shippers — big indus-
tries or private senders of gifts and remem-
brances —
use AIR Express for all rush
orders and last-minute deliveries.
That AIr Express speed means greater
profits is more than just theory. It's a
reality. A contractor saved $3,000 a day by
means of AIR ExprEss. A retailer slashed
his inventory costs nearly 90%. A manu-
facturer clinched a $10,000 order overnight.
There are countless other examples of the
profitable use of AIr Express service, by
business men just like yourself.
See the typical cases reported on the in-
side pages by fast-thinking users of AIR
Express. What AIR ExpresS speed has
done for them, it can do for you, too.
Take advantage of this door-to-door,
3-mile-a-minute shipping service today.
It's nation-wide. Merely phone or visit
your nearest Railway Express office, AIR
ExPRESS Division, and ask for AIR ExPREsS
schedules, rates and complete shipping
information. Then, next time you have
anything to send anywhere, just tell them
when to call. Remember, there's no extra
charge for this prompt, convenient pick-up
and delivery service in all cities and prin-
cipal towns. When you want anything in
a hurry from out of town, have it sent AIR
ExpreSS right to your door — 2500 miles
overnight.
ONLY AIR EXPRESS OFFERS YOU ALL THESE SHIPPING ADVANTAGES!

properties.sfomuseum:description: Promotional brochure issued by Air Express; tri-fold format; red and blue cover with partial illustration of Douglas DC-3 and text “Here’s how you can use Air Express for more business”; interior features information about various services.
